title: A Sequence-to-Sequence&Set Model for Text-to-Table Generation. (arXiv:2306.00137v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Recently, the text-to-table generation task has attracted increasing attention due to its wide applications. In this aspect, the dominant model formalizes this task as a sequence-to-sequence generation task and serializes each table into a token sequence during training by concatenating all rows in a top-down order. However, it suffers from two serious defects: 1) the predefined order introduces a wrong bias during training, which highly penalizes shifts in the order between rows; 2) the error propagation problem becomes serious when the model outputs a long token sequence. In this paper, we first conduct a preliminary study to demonstrate the generation of most rows is order-insensitive. Furthermore, we propose a novel sequence-to-sequence&set text-to-table generation model. Specifically, in addition to a text encoder encoding the input text, our model is equipped with a table header generator to first output a table header, i.e., the first row of the table, in the manner of sequence

translated_title: 一种文本到表格生成的序列到序列&集合模型
translated_abstract: 最近，文本到表格生成任务因其广泛应用而受到越来越多的关注。在这个方面，主导模型将该任务形式化为序列到序列生成任务，并通过在训练期间将每个表格串行化为令牌序列，通过从上到下连接所有行。然而，它存在两个严重缺陷：1）预定义的顺序在训练期间引入了错误的偏差，高度惩罚行之间的顺序移动；2）当模型输出长标记序列时，错误传播问题变得严重。在本文中，我们首先进行了初步研究，以证明大多数行的生成是和顺序无关的。此外，我们提出了一种新的序列到序列&集合文本到表格生成模型。具体而言，除了文本编码器之外，我们的模型还配备了一个表头生成器，以顺序方式首先输出表头，即表格的第一行。
tldr: 这篇论文提出了一种序列、序列和集合模型，以解决文本到表格生成任务中的两个常见问题。与现有方法相比，该模型更具灵活性和实用性，可产生更准确的结果。
